channel.title: Need some Linux Shell Help
channel.description:
Hello. I have a VPS That I got to run my private server. I have the compiler.sh and run.sh right and the server goes online but whenever I exit out of SSH the server shuts down. How can I have it keep the server up 24/7 when I leave SSH? And maybe have an Auto Restarter?
Thanks, Rfizzle

item.title: Need some Linux Shell Help
